page.title: 17CARBERRY CANDLES
page.content: THE CANDLEWORKS WAS A LAUNDRY FOR CARBERRY TOWER. THERE ARE 14 STAFF IN THE FACTORY. THE WAX COMES FROM SHELL OIL. THEY DO NOT MAKE CHURCH CANDLES BECAUSE THEY ARE MADE OF BEESWAX. THE DYES AND MACHINERY COME FROM GERMANY. THE CANDLES ARE ALL SHAPES AND SIZES DESIGNS AND COLOURS. THE MOULDS MAKE THE SHAPES. OVER ONE MILLION CANDLES ARE SOLD EACH YEAR. THE CANDLES ARE SOLD TO SHOPS HERE AND IN HOLLAND AND ICELAND AND OTHER COUNTRIES. THERE IS A CANDLE SHOP NEXT TO THE FACTORY. IT IS NEW. THE TALLOW WORKS IS NEXT DOOR. IT USED TO BE A SAW-MILL. TALLOW IS OLD OIL AND FAT USED FOR LIPSTICK, HAIRSPRAY, SOAP POWDER AND ANIMAL FOOD.
